languages.text: "Вот и ты, технобрат". {n}Хриплый голос звучит прерывисто, взгляд обращен на Паскаля.{/n}
"There you are, tech-brother." {n}Brasswhisper's voice is raspy and punctuated. His gaze is turned toward Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вот и ты, технобрат". {n}Хриплый голос звучит прерывисто, взгляд обращен на Паскаля.{/n}

languages.text: 「技術同胞じゃないか」{n}ブラスウィスパーの声は耳障りでところどころ途切れる。彼の視線がパスカルに向けられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There you are, tech-brother." {n}Brasswhisper's voice is raspy and punctuated. His gaze is turned toward Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「技術同胞じゃないか」{n}ブラスウィスパーの声は耳障りでところどころ途切れる。彼の視線がパスカルに向けられる。{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “你来了，技术兄弟。”{n}铜语沙哑的声音断断续续，目光转向了帕斯卡。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There you are, tech-brother." {n}Brasswhisper's voice is raspy and punctuated. His gaze is turned toward Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你来了，技术伙伴。”{n}这位技术祭司沙哑的声音断断续续，目光转向了帕斯卡。{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Vous voilà, cher technoconfrère, » {n}dit Murmecuivre d'une voix rauque et saccadée, le regard rivé sur Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There you are, tech-brother." {n}Brasswhisper's voice is raspy and punctuated. His gaze is turned toward Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous voilà, cher technoconfrère, » {n}dit-il d'une voix rauque et saccadée, le regard rivé sur Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Ahí estás, tecnohermano». {n}Su voz suena ronca y entrecortada y dirige la mirada hacia Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There you are, tech-brother." {n}Brasswhisper's voice is raspy and punctuated. His gaze is turned toward Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Buenas, tecnocamarada». {n}Su voz suena ronca y entrecortada y dirige la mirada hacia Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Da seid Ihr ja, Tech-Bruder." {n}Messingflüsterers Stimme ist heiser und staccato-artig. Sein Blick ist auf Pasqal gerichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There you are, tech-brother." {n}Brasswhisper's voice is raspy and punctuated. His gaze is turned toward Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Da seid Ihr ja, Techkamerad." {n}Die Stimme ist heiser und staccato-artig. Ihr Blick ist auf Pasqal gerichtet.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "İşte buradasın tekno kardeşim." {n}Pirinçfısıltı'nın sesi, kulak tırmalayıp ve kesintili çıkıyor. Bakışlarını Pasqal'a çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There you are, tech-brother." {n}Brasswhisper's voice is raspy and punctuated. His gaze is turned toward Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İşte buradasın tekno kardeşim." {n}Pirinçfısıltı'nın sesi kulak tırmalayıcı ve kesintili. Bakışları Pasqal'a doğru dönüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
